short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is used to Capture the Page and let you annotate the Captured Image and will be stored in the Salesforce Org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension is used to capture the full page of the user through our Salesforce AppExchange App without the App the users cannot use the Chrome Extension. They must Install the App in order to use the Chrome Extension. It's very important tool for the Salesforce AppExchange App.
